name: PhilipsShaverCleaningCartridgeIntegration
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Get that new shaver feeling every day, by daily cleaning your shaver. Just in time smart reordering of cleaning cartridges when you need it. 

Alexa will let you know when your Philips Shaver’s cleaning cartridge is running low and needs a replacement. 

Set up smart reorders by connecting your Philips GroomTribe app with Amazon Alexa, so you always have cleaning cartridges when needed.

In order to use Philips Shaver Cleaning Cartridge Integration skill for Amazon Alexa, you’ll need to have GroomTribe app installed on your mobile phone. Login to Philips account and link your Amazon account within GroomTribe app. Then, getting started is easy.

You can download Philips GroomTribe app from below links. iOS only till March 2021. Android after March 2021

www.philips.com/MyShaver7000-app
